ACTION_TO: Action to do when the conditions are met. You can use the following keywords: #device_name#, #device_id#, #sensor_type#, #value# and #variable#.
ACTIVE_QTY_HELP_TEXT: Quantity of sensors that have sent any information in the last hour.
ADD_AN_IMAGE_TO_BE_DISPLAYED_INSIDE_THE_: Add an image to be displayed inside the info box (jpg, jpeg, png)
ADD_MORE_INFORMATION_TO_BE_SHOWN_IN_THE_: Add more information to be shown in the info box when click on the pin
ALERT_LIST_BY_GROUP_HELP_TEXT: Alerts created for the selected group will show up here. Only the group's sensor(s) selected will be listened.
ALERT_LIST_BY_SENSOR_HELP_TEXT: Alerts created for the selected sensor(s) will show up here. Only the sensor(s) selected will be listened.
ASSOCIATE_AN_EVENT_WITH_THIS_GEOFENCE: Associate an event with this geofence
ASSOCIATE_A_VARIABLE_DATA_SOURCE_WITH_TH: Associate a variable (data source) with this pin
AUTHORIZATION_PARAM_FOR_DOWNLINK_SUPPORT: Authorization Param for downlink support, enter region;integration id
BTN_HELP: By clicking "Send Report", a report will be sent immediately containing the current system status for all users created.
BY_GROUP_TABLE_TOOLTIP: Reports created for the selected group will be displayed here. Only the group(s) will be listed in the report.
BY_SENSOR_TABLE_TOOLTIP: Reports created for the selected sensor(s) will be displayed here. Only the sensor(s) selected will be listed in the report.
CHOOSE_THE_GROUP_WHERE_THE_DEVICE_WILL_B: Choose the group where the device will be placed.
CLICK_ON_THE_TOOLS_ABOVE_TO_START_CREATI: Click on the Tools above to start creating one
CREATE_GROUP_ACCOUNT: Create a group for your account.
DATA_RETENTION_MONTH_SET_0_FOR_NO_DATA_R: Data Retention (Month) *Set 0 for no data retention*
DATA_RETENTION_PLACEHOLDER: Data Retention, given in month(s). If set to "0" it will be retain forever.
DATA_RETENTION_TOOLTIP: Retain data for X months. If set to "0" it will retain data forever.
DEFINE_AN_EMBED_TO_APPEAR_IN_INFO_BOX: Define an embed to appear in info box
DEFINE_A_LABEL_TO_BE_SHOWN_INSIDE_THE_IN: Define a label to be shown inside the info box
DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_FLOOR: Do you really want to delete this floor?
DRAG_AND_DROP_YOUR_IMAGE_HERE: Drag and drop your image here
DRAG_THE_PIN_OVER_THE_MAP_OR_TYPE_IN_AN_: drag the pin over the map or type in an address
EMAIL_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: Plan's email usage limit (qty/mo). Will be reset for the organization on the first day of the month.
EUI_TOOLTIP: A random EUI will be generated for the sensors using the simulator. No EUI is needed since its a mock device.
FILL_UP_THE_FIELDS_WITH_INFORMATION_ABOU: Fill up the fields with information about the new device.
FORM_H: Be careful, by inviting a new user a credential access will be granted to that email.
GIVE_A_NAME_FOR_THIS_FLOOR: Give a name for this floor
GIVE_A_NAME_FOR_THIS_GEOFENCE: Give a name for this geofence
IF_THE_CONDITIONS: If the conditions match, the alert will be triggered. Use 1 and 0 to represent ON or OFF respectively.
IF_THE_CONDITIONS_MATCH_THE_ALERT_WILL_B: If the conditions match, the alert will be triggered. Unit has to be the one the sensor sends
IF_THE_VALUE_IS_RELATED_TO_TEMPERATURE_I: If the value is related to temperature, it will be shown as °C.
INACTIVE_QTY_HELP_TEXT: Quantity of sensors that didn't send any information in the last hour.
LAST_SEEN_TOOLTIP: Given in “hours ago”. It will turn red if it has not been communicated with in the past 24 hours, and a check-in alert will be sent via notification and email.
LIST_OF_GROUP: List of the user's group(s). Max: 2 groups.
MOVE_PIN: Move the map pin or type the group's address
NAME: Name
NAME_PLACEHOLDER_PLAN: type a name for the new plan
NO: No, I want to invite later.
NOTIFY_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: Plan's Push Notification usage limit (qty/mo). Will be reset for the organization on the first day of the month.
ORG_TABLE_INFO: List of the organization created, you can also create a new one on the button aside.
PLAN_INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: select a plan (you can create plans at "plan management")
PLAN_LIST_HELP_TEXT: If an organization is using an existing plan, you will not be able to delete it.
PLAN_PLACEHOLDER: Plans can be created at Plan Management sidebar button.
SELECT_AN_ICON_TO_REPRESENT_THIS_BEACON: Select an icon to represent this pin
SELECT_THE_ACTION_TYPE: select one or multiple communication means
SELECT_THE_GROUP_THAT_WILL_TRIGGER_THE_A: select the group that will trigger the alert
SELECT_THE_LOCATION_OF_THE_NEW_BEACON: Select the location of the new pin
SMS_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: Plan's SMS usage limit (qty/mo). Will be reset for the organization on the first day of the month.
TABLE_INFO: List of sensor created. You can also create additional ones with the button "Create New". Limit: 5 sensors
THE_AUTHORIZATION_CODE_TO_USE_AT_THE_NET: The authorization code to use at the Network Server
THIS_ALERT: This alert will not be sent again until the unlock condition is met.
THIS_SECTION_IS_OPTIONAL_YOU_CAN_EITHER_: This section is optional. You can either make an invitation now or invite later at sidebar button "Users" later.
TYPE_OR_SCAN: type or scan your device code
UPLOAD_THE_FLOOR_BACKGROUND_JPG_JPEG_PNG: Upload the floor background (jpg, jpeg, png)
VARIABLE_TOOLTIP: Variable(s) which will be consider in the action's trigger condition.
YES: Yes, I want to invite now.
YOU_CAN_DISPLAY_AN_IMAGE_OR_EMBED_AN_WID: You can display an image or embed an widget
DR_TOOLTIP: All data older than X months will be deleted from your account. If set to 0 the data will be retained forever.
SERVICE_TOOLTIP: Current service usage are updated every 2 minutes.
CLICK_AND_DRAG_TO_DRAW_CIRCLE: Click and drag to draw circle
CLICK_FIRST_POINT_TO_CLOSE_THIS_SHAPE: Click first point to close this shape
DRAG_THE_POINT_TO_EDIT_OR_CLICK_TO_DELET: Drag the point to edit or click to delete
CLICK_ON_A_GEOFENCE_TO_EDIT: Click on a geofence to edit
CLICK_ON_A_GEOFENCE_TO_DELETE: Click on a geofence to delete
